Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_close_3D_listener

The function AIL_close_3D_listener closes the 3D listener handle.

void AIL_close_3D_listener(
  H3DPOBJECT listener
);

In Parameters

listener
indicates the listener handle to close.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_open_3D_listener
Related Basic Types: H3DPOBJECT, void
